recipesJson.name: Jackfruit Citri-Shake (Flavor Book Entry Recipe)
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This recipe is a vibrant blend of jackfruit, dragonfruit, blood orange, and mandarin, laid on a bed of whipped cream.
Recipe was made for "(TFA) Jackfruit" FlavorBook Entry
->

reviews.text: This is a very refreshing, citrus,and creamy vape. I steeped as suggested and I am very pleased with the flavor and can only imagine what the flavors will do in a few more days. I did blend mine at 70vg.
